搭.definition: to put up; to build (scaffolding); to hang (clothes on a pole); to connect; to join; to arrange in pairs; to match; to add; to throw in (resources); to take (boat, train); variant of 褡[da1]

搭乘.definition: to ride as a passenger; to travel by (car, plane etc)

搭伙.definition: to join up with sb; to become partner; to take meals regularly in cafeteria

搭售.definition: to sell an item only as part of a bundle (thereby forcing consumers to buy goods they do not want); to sell on a tie-in basis

搭坐.definition: to travel by; to ride on

搭建.definition: to build (esp. with simple materials); to knock together (a temporary shed); to rig up

搭扣.definition: a buckle or fastener for clothing that does not use a button and buttonhole (e.g. the buckle on metal wristwatches)

搭把手兒.definition: erhua variant of 搭把手[da1 ba3 shou3]

搭擋.definition: variant of 搭檔|搭档[da1 dang4]

搭架子.definition: to put up scaffolding; to build a framework; to launch an enterprise

搭界.definition: an interface; to relate with; to affiliate

搭當.definition: variant of 搭檔|搭档[da1 dang4]

搭肩.definition: to help lift up onto one's shoulders; to stand on sb's shoulder

搭腔.definition: to answer; to respond; to converse

搭茬.definition: to respond to what sb has just said

搭蓋.definition: to build (esp. with simple materials); to knock together (a temporary shed); to rig up

搭褳.definition: variant of 褡褳|褡裢[da1 lian5]

搭訕.definition: to hit on someone; to strike up a conversation; to start talking to end an awkward silence or embarrassing situation

搭話.definition: to talk; to get into conversation with; to send word

搭赸.definition: variant of 搭訕|搭讪[da1 shan4]

搭車.definition: to ride (in a vehicle); to get a lift; to hitch-hike

搭載.definition: (of a vehicle) to carry (a passenger or payload); (of a device or system) to be equipped with (a piece of hardware or software)

搭連.definition: variant of 褡褳|褡裢[da1 lian5]

搭配.definition: to pair up; to match; to arrange in pairs; to add sth into a group

搭鉤.definition: a hook; to make contact with sb

搭鐵.definition: abbr. for 搭鐵接線|搭铁接线; chassis grounding (i.e. using the chassis as ground, to serve as a return path for current in an electric circuit)
